title: Week 7 Recap: The Chiefs' Struggles Continue, the Bengals' Statement Win, and What’s Wrong With the Dolphins
description:
Kevin and Nora are joined by Benjamin Solak to discuss the Titans' dominant victory over the Chiefs (2:30). Then they discuss the Bengals taking control of the AFC North, the Colts' Sunday-night road win, and more (21:45). Then Kevin and Nora are joined by Steven Ruiz to discuss the Dolphins losing again, this time to the Atlanta Falcons, and what Miami's next steps are (1:19:57). Then Kevin and Nora wrap up by answering a listener question.

Hosts: Kevin Clark and Nora Princiotti
Guests: Benjamin Solak and Steven Ruiz|
Production Assistant: Isaiah Blakely
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal
